page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: IN{CREICH SCHOOL}THERE ARE TWO TEACHERS,A JANITOR AND 21 PUPILS. THE AREA IS A WIDE SPREAD ONE SO A BUS IS NEEDED TO BRING AND RETURN THE OUTLYING{PUPILS}.WE GET VARIOUS VISITING{TEACHERS}FOR SPECIALIST SUBJECTS. EVERY SECOND TERM WE GO {SWIMMING}AND WORK FOR VARIOUS BADGES.EVERY YEAR WE HAVE TWO SPORTS DAYS,A SPORTS DAY AT{GLENROTHES}WITH MANY OTHER SCHOOLS AND OUR SCHOOL SPORTS WHICH WE SHARE WITH TWO OTHER SCHOOLS.WE HOLD RACES AND WIN BADGES FOR PRIZES.WE HAVE A{SCHOOL OUTING WHERE WE GO AWAY FOR A DAY AND IN JANUARY OR FEBRUARY WE GO TO A {PANTOMIME.}AT SCHOOL WE LEARN {MATHEMATICS,LANGUAGE,ENVIRONENTAL {STUDIES,MUSIC,ARTS,CRAFTS,PHYSICAL {EDUCATION}AND{RELIGIOUS EDUCATION. OTHER ACTIVITIES INCLUDE{DANCING, {TENNIS,AND PROJECTS EACH TERM.
